channel.title: || ChronicFire 614 || Spawn-Pk || Economy || Gambling || SafePk||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3imGA.png[/img] ChronicFire is a 614 Pking based Economy server where you can spawn pots, food, and useless junk :P The home area is the Grand Exchange and once you step out of the concrete border you enter SafePk where you can fight to the death for Tokkul and a chance at a good PvP drop. Come check us out to have a whole lot of fun and be brought back to the era of runescape we all know and love :).
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IVzOxqS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FG2P3Lq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZyAM0Lh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PWspvlI.png[/img]
[B][U][COLOR="#00FF00"]There is a small login bug, it says invalid server responce the first time, click login twice to get in. We appologise for the inconvience[/COLOR][/U][/B] [URL=http://"http://chronicrsps.com/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://chronicrsps.com/playnow"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/103471050/ChronicFire.jar"]Download Client[/URL][[COLOR="#00FF00"]Recommended[/COLOR]]
Credits: Dementhium Team Myself & Orisi
Player made videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiK3N8unTDU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiK3N8unTDU[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4SnzwlScyb0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4SnzwlScyb0[/url]
